stablecoin.name: Stablecoin
stablecoin.description: Tokens that are fixed to an external asset, e.g. the US dollar.

wrapped.name: Wrapped
wrapped.description: Tokens that are wrapped or peg representation of digital assets. Excluded stablecoins

synthetics.name: Synthetics
synthetics.description: Synthetic assets created to track the value of another asset

nft.name: NFT
nft.description: Non-fungible tokens or tokens associated with the NFT ecosystem.

dao.name: DAO
dao.description: Tokens that govern decentralized autonomous organizations (DAOs).

staking.name: Staking
staking.description: Tokens that are used for staking to receive rewards.
